CustomField.description: Total duration in seconds of the job execution. This value can be used to track job performance.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(copado__Start_Time__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(copado__End_Time__c)) ), (copado__End_Time__c - copado__Start_Time__c)*24*60*60, NULL )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Display how long in seconds this process took to execute.
CustomField.label: Duration (in seconds)
